00043 struct cparser_node_ {
00044     cparser_node_type_t   type;      
00045     uint32_t              flags;     
00046     void                  *param;    
00047     char                  *desc;     
00049     cparser_node_t        *sibling;
00051     cparser_node_t        *children;
00052 };
00053 
00054 #define CPARSER_NODE_FLAGS_OPT_START          (1 << 0)
00055 #define CPARSER_NODE_FLAGS_OPT_END            (1 << 1)
00056 #define CPARSER_NODE_FLAGS_OPT_PARTIAL        (1 << 2)
00057 #define CPARSER_NODE_FLAGS_HIDDEN             (1 << 3)
00058 
00059 #define VALID_PARSER(p)  (p)
00060 
00061 #define NODE_USABLE(p,n) (((p)->is_privileged_mode) ||                  \
00062                           (!((n)->flags & CPARSER_NODE_FLAGS_HIDDEN)))
00063 
00065 #define CURRENT_LINE(p)  ((p)->cur_line)
